# claude-code

**This is not the package you're looking for!**

The official Claude Code package is available at:

**[@anthropic-ai/claude-code](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@anthropic-ai/claude-code)**

Please install the correct package:

```bash
npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
```

Or visit the official package page: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@anthropic-ai/claude-code
